mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMP (emp_ID, emp_NAME, emp_PW, emp_EMAIL, emp_SX, emp_TEL, CO_CD, emp_OD, emp_AUTH, emp_CD) VALUES (#{empId}, #{empName}, #{empPw}, #{empEmail}, #{empSx}, #{empTel}, #{coCd}, #{empOd}, #{empAuth}, #{empCd});
mapper.select: SELECT * from EMP where emp_ID = #{empId} and emp_PS = #{empPs}
SELECT * FROM EMP JOIN CO ON CO.CO_CD = EMP.CO_CD JOIN DIVS ON DIVS.DIV_CD = EMP.DIV_CD WHERE EMP.EMP_ID = #{empId}
SELECT emp_Id FROM EMP WHERE emp_ID = #{empId}
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(emp_Cd), 0) FROM EMP where CO_CD = #{coCd}
